reviews.review: good shooter if you have the time to grind up your skills, shooters aren't really my thing though.

Although you get some retards on it like little kids that shouldn't be playing it or the annoying cunts that just want to ruin your fun by trying to get you banned though team damage or the script kiddies that get annoyed because people are better then them but 9/10 you find a good match.
QUE JOGO FIXE JOGO A MUITO TENPO
fuckin great game to play with the boys during quarantine
Great game, ranking is kinda off but besides that still a classic.
Just a good all around game and great to play with friends
vewy good, vac system bad, banned main but buy anyway <3
